name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.input.lineinputformat.linespermap
description:
When using NLineInputFormat, the number of lines of input data
  to include in each split.

name: nfs.rtmax
description:
This is the maximum size in bytes of a READ request
    supported by the NFS gateway. If you change this, make sure you
    also update the nfs mount's rsize(add rsize= # of bytes to the 
    mount directive).

name: mapreduce.reduce.merge.inmem.threshold
description:
The threshold, in terms of the number of files
  for the in-memory merge process. When we accumulate threshold number of files
  we initiate the in-memory merge and spill to disk. A value of 0 or less than
  0 indicates we want to DON'T have any threshold and instead depend only on
  the ramfs's memory consumption to trigger the merge.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.read.timeout
description:
Expert: The maximum amount of time (in milli seconds) reduce
  task waits for map output data to be available for reading after obtaining
  connection.

name: mapreduce.map.cpu.vcores
description:
The number of virtual cores to request from the scheduler for
  each map task.

name: tfile.fs.output.buffer.size
description: Buffer size used for FSDataOutputStream in bytes.
